label: what-name-should-be-used-for-the-top-level-document-1
title: What name should be used for the top level document?

problem.body: The problem statement is a document that outlines the problem which is being addressed. It should provide scope to the discussion, and provide context when the decision is reviewed in the future.
We need a name for this document that properly conveys the intentions. The name will influence how these problem statements are written in the future.

full.body: I propose to use the name "Statement". It is generic enough to encompass most topics, but specific enough to convey intent.
